item.title: [Python] Create a Python environment for VS Pro with VS Code on Windows
item.description: The following is assumed. I will also write the version at hand when creating the article. Windows10 VS Code installed (1.40.1) Windows version Python installed (3.8.0) After installing Python also installed on the right on Windows â‡’ online-judge-tools #Goal You can execute test in sample case with Ctrl+Shift+B, Create an environment where you can manually execute a test with Ctrl+Shift+T. Folder structure I did the following: One file for each question, and throw it all under src.
